Package nl.b3p.tailormap.api.security

Class AuthorizationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.b3p.tailormap.api.security.AuthorizationService
  • @Service
public class AuthorizationService
extends Object
    Validates access control rules. Any call to mayUserRead will verify that the currently logged in user is not only allowed to read the current object, but any objcet above and below it in the hierarchy.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AuthorizationService​(LevelRepository levelRepository, LayerRepository layerRepository)  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean isProxiedSecuredServiceLayerInPublicApplication​(nl.tailormap.viewer.config.app.Application application, nl.tailormap.viewer.config.app.ApplicationLayer applicationLayer)
      When a service is proxied with a username and password, authentication must be required for the application otherwise access to the layer should be denied to prevent an app admin accidentally publishing private data from a secured service in a public application.
      boolean mayUserRead​(nl.tailormap.viewer.config.app.Application application)
      Verifies that this user may read this Application.

      Verifies that this user may view an ApplicationLayer in the context of a certain Application.

      Verifies that this user may view a GeoService.

    • Method Detail

      • mayUserRead

        public boolean mayUserRead​(nl.tailormap.viewer.config.app.Application application)
        Verifies that this user may read this Application.
        Parameters:
        application - the Application to check
        Returns:
        the results from the access control checks.

      • mayUserRead

        public boolean mayUserRead​(nl.tailormap.viewer.config.app.ApplicationLayer applicationLayer,
                           nl.tailormap.viewer.config.app.Application context)
        Verifies that this user may view an ApplicationLayer in the context of a certain Application. As an ApplicationLayer cannot be traced back to a single Application (e.g. mashups), this requires passing in the Application to use as context. The ApplicationLayer, its parent Levels, and the Application are validated, as are the Layer, all its parents, and the GeoService.
        Parameters:
        applicationLayer - the ApplicationLayer to check
        context - the Application to verify this ApplicationLayer against
        Returns:
        the results from the access control checks.

      • isProxiedSecuredServiceLayerInPublicApplication

        public boolean isProxiedSecuredServiceLayerInPublicApplication​(nl.tailormap.viewer.config.app.Application application,
                                                               nl.tailormap.viewer.config.app.ApplicationLayer applicationLayer)
        When a service is proxied with a username and password, authentication must be required for the application otherwise access to the layer should be denied to prevent an app admin accidentally publishing private data from a secured service in a public application. This method checks whether this is the case for a certain ApplicationLayer in the context of an Application.
        Parameters:
        application - the application (can be a mashup)
        applicationLayer - the application layer (may belong to a parent application)
        Returns:
        see above

      • mayUserRead

        public boolean mayUserRead​(nl.tailormap.viewer.config.services.Layer layer)
        Verifies that this user may view a Layer. The Layer, its parents, and the GeoService are all validated.
        Parameters:
        layer - the Layer to check
        Returns:
        the results from the access control checks.

      • mayUserRead

        public boolean mayUserRead​(nl.tailormap.viewer.config.app.Level level)
        Verifies that this user may view a Level. The Level and its parents are all validated.
        Parameters:
        level - the Level to check
        Returns:
        the results from the access control checks.

      • mayUserRead

        public boolean mayUserRead​(nl.tailormap.viewer.config.services.GeoService geoService)
        Verifies that this user may view a GeoService. The GeoService is validated.
        Parameters:
        geoService - the GeoService to check
        Returns:
        the results from the access control checks.
